messages.title: Fighting for real change
messages.content: Our Country needs a strong opposition

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union. That is why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

We need additional investment in health and social care services as a matter of urgency. Mental health should also be a priority. The Liberal Democrats pledge to raise top tax for health spending and give Wales an extra £300m a year to spend on this vital service.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Giving our children the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing in education and training can give our children the best possible start in life. That is why our pupil development grant, targeted at the poorest pupils has already delivered an extra £30m directly to Swansea schools.

issues.education: Giving our children the best start in life

contactInformation.address: Lox Cottage Printing, Pantyffynnon Road, Morrison, Swansea SA6 6BA

examples: Giving our children the best start in life

Investing in education and training can give our children the best possible start in life. That is why our pupil development grant, targeted at the poorest pupils has already delivered an extra £30m directly to Swansea schools.

We need additional investment in health and social care services as a matter of urgency. Mental health should also be a priority. The Liberal Democrats pledge to raise top tax for health spending and give Wales an extra £300m a year to spend on this vital service.
The Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union. That is why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

personalStories.story: Michael O'Carroll is a local businessman who lives in the St Helen's area. He moved to Swansea in 2014 to work for commercial services at Swansea University, running projects in research and innovation supporting businesses in Mid Wales. He is a serving Army reservist with 3rd Battalion the Royal Welsh & Company, based in Morfa. He lives with his wife and children and has a first-class honors degree in International History and Politics from the University of Leeds.

examples: Leading the fight against the Conservatives’ hard Brexit
